text: Nʼoge a, Adonaịja1:5 Adonaịja, bụ nwa nke anọ a mụrụ Devid. Ọkpara ya bụ Amọn, Kiliab na Absalọm nwụrụ anwụ, ma Kiliab nwụrụ nʼoge ọ bụ nwantakịrị. 2Sa 3:4 onye nne ya bụ Hagit, wepụtara onwe ya, kwuo sị, “Aga m abụ eze.” Nʼihi nke a, ọ kwadooro onwe ya ụgbọ agha na ọtụtụ ịnyịnya, kpọtakwa iri ndị ikom ise, ndị ga-agba ọsọ nʼihu ya.
